title: looking to get back to this game
body:
hey everyone, 
i'm looking to get back in to league, have been out for far while( close to 6 months of not playing a normal game)  but its hard to do alone so i'm writing this post to see if anyone feels the same or looking for another player who is somewhat rusty, in time would want to get a group of people that would like to climb when there ready to start. 
was an ADC and MID main when i played but open to anything, but like i said will need time to practice if wanna push ranks.


so add me if your keen and we can go from there 
IGN: icedpenguin


cheers everyone

replies.body: Hey my dude, I'm in the same boat as you havent played in like 7 or 8 months and looking to get back into it. I added you, names Feelsbaddan :)
save yourself the bother and dont return to this toxic game
dont come back its gone to shit
